About the Sol Plaatje University (SPU) Postgraduate Application 2024

This is to enlighten the entire student that the management of the Sol Plaatje University (SPU) is inviting applications from interested and suitably qualified students (Indigents and International) for admission into Postgraduate programmes for the 2024 academic year.

Before Appling, know the actual programs (Course) available for the 2024Postgraduateadmission.

How to Apply for SPU Postgraduate Application 2024

  • Visit here
  • Select the 2024 Postgraduate Programmes
  • Create an Account with your valid email on the portal.
  • Fill all necessary forms.

Documents Required for SPU Online Application 2024

  • A valid NBT Academic Literacy Test Plus report with an overall score of Upper Intermediate or above.
  • A TOEFL iBT Score Report with an overall score of 88 or above, with at least 19 in Listening, 19 in Writing, 20 in Reading, and 22 in Speaking.
  • A valid IELTS Academic Test Report Form with an overall score of band 6.5 or above, with at least 6.0 in each component.
  • A valid PTE Academic Score Report with an overall score of 67 or above, with at least 59 in each communicative skills component.

Pay all applicable fees

30 November 2024.
